customer_addr:

LA HABRA, CA 90631

citations.narrative:
The annual report for the previous Federal fiscal year, signed by the Institutional Official, has not been submitted to the
Animal Care Regional Director prior to December 1, 2019. Submission of the annual report is necessary to assure
compliance with the standards for the care and use of live animals by a research facility. The annual report for the
previous Federal fiscal year, signed by the Institutional Official, must be submitted to the Animal Care office in Fort
Collins, Colorado.
To be corrected by: October 15, 2020
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
2.36(a) 
   
Annual report. 
The annual report for the previous Federal fiscal year, signed by the Institutional Official, has not been submitted to the 
Animal Care Regional Director prior to December 1, 2019. Submission of the annual report is necessary to assure 
compliance with the standards for the care and use of live animals by a research facility. The annual report for the 
previous Federal fiscal year, signed by the Institutional Official, must be submitted to the Animal Care office in Fort 
Collins, Colorado. 
To be corrected by: October 15, 2020 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
End Section
